char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Progress has been made.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The spell may have been turned off but you won't have any progress in restoring your hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Others will abandon finding opportunities to become long-hair models.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: They may have formed all over Gensokyo, and some are also hosting fancy balls dedicated to this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Me and my daughter could've been huge hits in Gensokyo.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've already won against you again. What are you going to do now since the spell has been broken?

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If I want to be successful again, I have one favor to ask. You can cut your own hair and give it to me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I can construct a wig to replace my hair that may take over a decade to restore.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: While I will accept your request, this entire situation was beyond absurd.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: A lot of people in Gensokyo have become foul beasts.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Anyone who dares to restart this spell will have my Purification Rod down their throats.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Empress Kaguya and Queen Yukari were not affected.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You were not happy with this. You appear to hate any form of long hair past the waist.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: After a civil war several years ago, I cut and dyed my own hair for a new beginning.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My legacy will live on in woodblock prints.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This was unacceptable.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm happy to be back to my old self but some are still swinging and whipping their hair in my face!

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even if another incident happens, I won't be finished.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I will put an end to all future incidents even if I have you eliminated.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: To speed up my regrowth, I will take lots of keratin vitamins.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I will put an end to all future incidents even if I have you eliminated.
